hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: SCX Agenciamentos Marítimos
hero.desc: In SCX Agenciamentos Marítimos, we offer efficient and reliable transportation solutions for all your transportation needs in all the continents of the world.

services.freight_title: The SCX Agenciamentos Department is divided into several subdivisions to ensure a high-quality service to our customers.
services.insurance_title: Insurance and complete logistical support for your cargo.
services.insurance_description: We ensure total protection for your goods.
services.customer_focus_title: We are a company focused on customer satisfaction, safety, and quality.
services.specialized_team_title: Our specialized team ensures your cargo arrives on time and with complete safety.
services.specialized_team_description: We are committed to offering comprehensive logistics support.
services.international_logistics_description: We have a specialized team to meet your needs.

contact.title: Get in Touch with Our Team
contact.content-1: Our experienced professionals ensure the swift and efficient clearance of goods through our electronic customs clearance network. We are committed to providing consistent and reliable services in a timely and professional manner.
contact.content-2: SCX AGENCIAMENTOS covers all major global airports, offering quality services at competitive rates. We maintain partnerships with various qualified companies committed to providing safe, efficient, and timely services worldwide.
contact.content-3: If you are interested in our rates, request a quote. We will respond within 24 hours. Please note that we also offer solutions for optimizing your logistics.

about.paragraph1: We offer a wide range of consolidated air freight forwarding services to most destinations around the world. Our comprehensive network of international services, combined with our team of world-class professionals, is ready to meet all your air freight needs, including cargo pickup, customs clearance, delivery, and distribution.
about.paragraph2: Our globally scheduled and reliable consolidation services, as well as door-to-door transportation, ensure short delivery times with the security and reliability your business demands. We also offer air charter services, as needed, for emergency situations, shipments of unusual sizes and shapes, or when you require an unscheduled air freight shipment.
about.paragraph3: By combining advanced logistics with the speed provided by air transportation, we offer the most modern solutions for your unique transportation challenges.

logistics.title: Our advanced logistics and services include:

door-to-door-service.title: Door-to-Door Service
door-to-door-service.description: Our door-to-door service ensures direct pickup and delivery of goods to the final destination, providing convenience and efficiency. This service eliminates the need for intermediaries, reducing time and costs associated with transportation.

direct-and-consolidated-transport.title: Direct and Consolidated Transport
direct-and-consolidated-transport.description: We offer direct and consolidated transport for import and export, optimizing logistics and reducing costs. Consolidated transport allows multiple shipments to be combined into a single shipment, making the process more economical.

hazardous-goods-transport.title: Hazardous Goods Transport
hazardous-goods-transport.description: We specialize in the transportation of hazardous goods, following strict safety standards. Our professionals are trained to handle and transport hazardous materials in accordance with international regulations, ensuring safety throughout the process.

perishable-goods-transport.title: Perishable Goods Transport
perishable-goods-transport.description: We offer specialized solutions for the transportation of perishable goods, ensuring that sensitive products, such as food and flowers, arrive at their destination in perfect condition. We use temperature control technologies and monitoring to maintain the quality of the products.

pharmaceutical-transport.title: Pharmaceutical Transport
pharmaceutical-transport.description: For the pharmaceutical industry, we provide specific transport solutions that maintain the integrity of products throughout the process. We use special packaging and temperature-controlled conditions to ensure that medicines and biological products are delivered safely and effectively.

packaging-services.title: Packaging Services
packaging-services.description: Our packaging services ensure that all goods are securely and appropriately packed for transportation. We use high-quality materials and advanced packaging techniques to protect products from damage during transport, ensuring they arrive in perfect condition at their final destination.
